text: Albert Edward "Ab" Hardy (October 6, 1909 – October 2002) was a Canadian speed skater who competed at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1910 births Category:Year of death missing Category:People from Lévis, Quebec Category:Sportspeople from Quebec Category:Canadian male speed skaters Category:Speed skaters at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic speed skaters of Canada
title: Ab Hardy
